name: My Little Shop (Flotbit Studios)
description:
My Little Shop is an idle shop simulation game where you take on the role of a shop owner. As the shop owner, you are responsible for buying items from suppliers when inventory is low, choosing what items to put on the shelf and making sure your shelves are always well stocked. 

Moreover, you can design and customize your shop layout, giving your Shop a unique and personalized look. As you progress through the game, you can invest in upgrades to keep up with the demand of your growing business.
